content.html: A surprising - and frequently unexpected - observation is how a high-growth scaleup that raised hundreds of millions, worth billions, is held together by what is best described as duct-tape solutions on the inside. Often explains the need to hire (and backfill) a large # of ppl.
content.value:
A surprising - and frequently unexpected - observation is how a high-growth scaleup that raised hundreds of millions, worth billions, is held together by what is best described as duct-tape solutions on the inside.

Often explains the need to hire (and backfill) a large # of ppl.
